document.query: CREATE TABLE `cooking_suggestion` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `description` TEXT NOT NULL , `status` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `cooking_suggestion_details` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `url` TEXT NOT NULL , `product_id` INT NOT NULL , `suggestion_id` INT NOT NULL , `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

INSERT INTO `permissions` (`id`, `name`, `description`, `type`, `parent_id`, `file_path`, `level`, `priority`, `icon_class_name`, `translation_code`, `disabled`, `master_disabled`, `site`, `created_at`, `updated_at`, `reference_table`, `reference_id`, `last_line`) VALUES (NULL, 'Cooking Suggestion', 'Cooking Suggestion', 'Sub Menu', '34', 'getCookingSuggest.php', '1', '13', '', 'A01712', '0', '0', 'Admin', '0000-00-00 00:00:00', '0000-00-00 00:00:00', '', '', '0')
